channel.title: [508] Emotes 9000-10025
channel.description:
Hey, not sure which section this belongs in, but I just spent about half an hour to an hour getting these. IF SOMEBODY HAS ALREADY DONE THIS, PLEASE, DON'T TELL ME >.< lol.
Also, don't leech them please.
Here they are:
[code] These ones were found by Carnage for [508] servers. (King Lingerz on Mopar forums)
9000 = Shaking that ass? 9001 = Wth? 9002 = Same as 9001 9003 = Sidestepping? 9004 = Holding something while running? 9005 = Cripple 9006 = Cripple 9007 = Cripple 9008 = Cripple 9009 = Cripple 9010 = Lmao, head slowly moves in a circle 9011 = Cripple 9012 = Breaking teleport glass then fading away 9013 = Fade in 9014 = Cripple 9015 = Cripple 9016 = Panting as if out of energy then fading away 9017 = Cripple 9018 = Fading in then panting as if out of energy 9019 = Cripple 9020 = Cripple 9021 = Hold up a sickle with an emerald in (Myrgue Part llll) 9022 = Hold up Rod of Ivandis (Myregue Part llll) 9023 = Sneaking around (Kennith's Concerns) 9024 = On ground, get up 9025 = On ground as if examining something closely 9026 = Your head slowly comes towards you lmao 9027 = Head slowly goes away from you 9028 = Rise up out of the ground in a crippled fasion 9029 = LMFAO, see for yourself 9030 = Same as above but slightly different 9031 = Sawing 9032 = Kicking something with saw in hand? 9033 = Cripple 9034 = Cripple 9035 = Cripple 9036 = Cripple 9037 = Cripple 9038 = Cripple 9039 = Walking like a zombie 9040 = Stood up asleep? 9041 = Nothing 9042 = Nothing 9043 = Nothing 9044 = Opening a draw? 9045 = Same as above 9046 = Cripple 9047 = Attacking with Rod of Ivandis 9048 = Blocking with Rod of Ivandis 9049 = Hands by sides, as if angry 9050 = Running? 9051 = Gay walk 9052 = Gay walk, then looks to side 9053 = Sidestepping while looking like holding a gun??? 9054 = Same as 9053 9055 = Dying!!! 9056 = Cripple 9057 = Slayer Skillcape emote? 9058 = Nodding 9059 = Telling them what to do (TokTz-Ket-Dill) 9060 = Looking round corner (SPY STYLE) 9061 = Same as above, but always looking round 9062 = Stops looking round 9063 = Looks side to side 9064 = Picking something up with Silver Sickle in hand? 9065 = Same as above, but yanking it 9066 = Cripple 9067 = Cripple 9068 = Looks like lighting a fire? 9069 = Holding balls and tilting head side to side? 9070 = Looks like walking as a zombie? 9071 = Laughing heartily ho ho ho 9072 = Same as 9071 9073 = Scratching head, as if confused? 9074 = Same as above 9075 = Cripple 9076 = Cripple 9077 = Cripple 9078 = Cripple 9079 = Cripple 9080 = Cripple 9081 = Cripple 9082 = Cripple 9083 = Cripple 9084 = Cripple 9085 = Cripple 9086 = Cripple 9087 = Gathering stuff up? 9088 = Dead cripple? 9089 = Same as above 9090 = Same as above 9091 = Bending down while walking? 9092 = Bending down while walking? 9093 = Cripple 9094 = Cripple 9095 = Woah! Karate? 9096 = Something else with Rod of Ivandis... 9097 = Same as above 9098 = Holding Rod of Ivandis above head as if chanting? 9099 = I give in, don't kill me (Fremmenik Trials?) 10000 = Standing still 10001 = Mining with Bronze 10002 = Mining with Iron 10003 = Mining with Steel 10004 = Mining with Mith 10005 = Mining with Adamant 10006 = Mining with Rune 10007 = Mining with Bronze again? 10008 = Saluting? 10009 = Crayfish fishing 10010 = Beckon? 10011 = Lighting fire 10012 = Kneeling down bending head over as if defeated? 10013 = Old clap emote 10015 = Crawling 10016 = Kneeling down then standing up 10017 = Stomping 10018 = Turkey emote! 10019 = Running 10020 = Arms go futher out, only just 10021 = Walking 10022 = Running 10023 = Cripple 10024 = Cripple 10025 = Cripple
Random cool/funny ones
10100 = Fade away 10101 = Looks up then side to side 10102 = Spankin that ass? lol. [/code]
They stop at 10200 and 10300 I think, but doing ::emote ##### over over and over again isn't my thing.
I'm gonna get the rest of them soon. Of course, I won't release if these get leeched. Also, if someone else has already done this, I will remove this. (I had a short search and couldn't find anything even like this.)
I found the Turkey emote in there from the Thanks Giving event, when [508]'s were made before the Thanks Giving event???
Anyways, enjoy. ;)
